title: Hour 3 - Bob Costas (06-10-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bob Costas (06-10-20)
description:
Bob Costas calls his 2 hours with Vin Scully his labor of love and says the response has been over whelming. Bob says without baseball he has been able to read a lot and watch some old great games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
